simplesect.title: NAME
simplesect.simpara: git-merge-one-file - The standard helper program to use with git-merge-index

simplesect.title: DESCRIPTION
simplesect.simpara: This is the standard helper program to use with git-merge-index to resolve a merge after the trivial merge done with git-read-tree -m.

simplesect.title: Author
simplesect.simpara: Written by Linus Torvalds <torvalds@osdl.org>, Junio C Hamano <gitster@pobox.com> and Petr Baudis <pasky@suse.cz>.

simplesect.title: Documentation
simplesect.simpara: Documentation by David Greaves, Junio C Hamano and the git-list <git@vger.kernel.org>.
